Description:
Role Purpose: control retail quality standards through different directions, (measure retail knowledge level., audit stores inventory ,cash control through stores visits & archiving control through stores visits also main reference to all stores through separate queue to support retail team during their working hours in any needed info, inquiry , problem solving & system errors).Job Responsibilities:    Ensure monitoring & observing retail process through retail stores feedback
    Find a solutions for improve channel sales performance through enhance retail process 
    Minimize risk and maximize benefits  
    Recommend actions based on competitive intelligence visits to overcome the gaps
    Manage and develop team’s performance.
    Provide support, guidance and solutions to the team.
    Handle retail communication mailbox daily (mails received from stores or stakeholders).
    Sending daily mail with all the updated processes & info to all retail team.
    Deliver the communication mails in attractive way.
    Ensure accurate information delivered to the staff.
    Introducing new effective tools for communication
    Own the interactive screen in terms of updating the info on it.
    Handle Think For Retail mailbox  & check the new ideas from team channel 
    Check do ability with  stakeholders.
    Work on the idea if applicable.
    Recognize the idea owner.
    Handle internal  transfers between stores either with pool cars or courier
    Handle factsheets design & update
    SPOC with marcom team to ensure applying the POS materials within all the channel
    Creating Activities and Ideas to Engage Retailers 
 Skills Required:    Excellent written and excellent verbal English & communication skills.
    Organized , owning the case attitude ( follow up ).
    Excellent computer skills.
    Problem solving skills
    Excellent leadership and Negotiation Skills
    Time management.
    Full awareness about retail structure and related functions.
